content:
Diagnosis:
Locally advanced gastric adenocarcinoma

Histology:
Moderately differentiated intestinal type adenocarcinoma
MMR deficient, HER2 negative
Stage IIIC (T4aN3aM0)

Previous treatment:
Neoadjuvant FLOT chemotherapy completed March 2024
Total gastrectomy with D2 lymphadenectomy 15 April 2024

MDT Discussion:
Case presented at Upper GI MDT 16 May 2024
Pathology review confirms ypT3N2 (6/28 nodes positive)
Evidence of treatment response in primary tumor (modified Ryan score 2)
No lymphovascular invasion identified
Resection margins clear (R0)

MDT Recommendation:
Proceed with adjuvant FLOT chemotherapy to complete perioperative protocol
Target start date within 6 weeks of surgery
Standard protocol - 4 cycles
Weekly clinical review during treatment

Current situation:
Reviewed today following MDT
Recovering well from surgery
Nutritional status improving with dietetic support
Performance status 1
Bloods show Hb 98, WCC 6.8, Platelets 345, normal renal and liver function

Plan discussed with patient who wishes to proceed with adjuvant treatment as recommended
Appointment arranged with chemotherapy unit for next week

cancer_timeline.value: Total gastrectomy with D2 lymphadenectomy performed
Pathology confirms ypT3N2 (6/28 nodes positive), modified Ryan score 2 showing treatment response, R0 resection

patient_facts.value: Hb 98, WCC 6.8, Platelets 345, normal renal and liver function
Recovering well from surgery with improving nutritional status

status_updates.value: Stage IIIC gastric cancer post neoadjuvant chemotherapy and surgery, showing partial treatment response. Now recovering well and planned for adjuvant chemotherapy
Pathological response to neoadjuvant therapy with modified Ryan score 2
MDT recommendation to proceed with adjuvant FLOT chemotherapy, 4 cycles
Appointment arranged with chemotherapy unit for next week
